text: he logo! ek udaaharan diya gaya hai, ise dhyaan se suno, jinhen tum allaah ke atirikt pukaarate ho, ve sab ek makkhee nahin paida kar sakate, yadyapi sab isake lie mil jaayen aur yadi unase makkhee kuchh chheen le, to usase vaapas nahin la sakate. maangane vaale nirbal aur jinase maanga jaaye, ve donon hee nirbal hain
